name: Project E.N.T.R.Y.
description:
PROJECT E.N.T.R.Y. is a Doom II partial conversion, only playable on GZDoom cuz of some features!

Demons invaded Earth again. After what happened on Mars, the Hell on Earth, TNT, and The Plutonia Experiment. USA formed Project "Extermination of Non-human Threats and Ravenous Yielding", E.N.T.R.Y. for short. You are the Leader of squad Alpha, and after a lucky Zombieman land a Headshot on you, breaking your helmet, you got knocked out for a short amount of time. These stupid bastards thought you were dead. Having the good old pistol in hand, it's time to move on and stop those fucking assholes! New Textures, Props, Guns, Powerups, and most importantly MONSTERS, fight through the hardest Map set you will ever play! Download the Demo of Project E.N.T.R.Y. with the first of three episodes, Entering Into Madness! #mod #action #retro #scifi #shooter #other

#ProjectENTRY

Scarlet Rebel TTV - 2021"Doom II but it's 5x more brutal, intense, and fucking hard. And I love it for that."

"The new enemies, especially the Hover Demon, are the real deal. Don't fuck around, lest you get ass raped and turned into a pussy or a bitch."

"E.N.T.R.Y. made me get good at Doom. Now go play it. It's gonna make you its bitch."
